snippet.title: IRON MEAT - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Iron Meat is a run-and-gun arcade shooter that immerses players in an apocalyptic future overrun by "The Meat," an iron-ravenous mass mutating everything in its path. Blast your way through retro-inspired stages and bosses to uncover the shocking horrors behind secret experiments on the Moon.

OUT NOW FOR ALL PLATFORMS:
🖥️ Steam: https://bit.ly/IronMeatSteam
🔴 Nintendo Switch: https://bit.ly/IronMeatNintendo
🔵 PlayStation: https://bit.ly/IronMeatPlayStation
🟢 Xbox: https://bit.ly/IronMeatXbox
🎮 Physical Edition: https://bit.ly/IronMeatPhysical
🟤 Epic Games: https://bit.ly/IronMeatEpic
🟡 Itch: https://bit.ly/IronMeatItchio
🟣 GOG: https://bit.ly/IronMeatGOG
🟠 VK Play: https://bit.ly/IronMeatVKplay

Sign up for email updates: https://bit.ly/IronMeatEmail

Co-Developed and Published by Retroware
https://retroware.com/
https://twitter.com/retroware

Developed and Programmed by Ivan Valeryevich Suvorov
https://twitter.com/ivanmeat

Narration by Gianni Matragrano
https://www.getgianni.com/
https://twitter.com/GetGianni

Edited by Joe La Scola
https://twitter.com/joelascola/
https://www.josephlascola.com/

#IronMeat #retro #indiegame #indiegames #contra #gaming
